description: This file is an index file that re-exports configuration and utility functions related to Babel's internal configuration management, including types, plugin loading, and config path resolution.

methods.name: findPackageData
methods.description: Function to find package data, such as package.json contents, in the directory hierarchy.

methods.name: findConfigUpwards
methods.description: Function to locate configuration files by searching upward in directory hierarchy.

methods.name: findRelativeConfig
methods.description: Function to find configuration relative to a given directory.

methods.name: findRootConfig
methods.description: Function to find the root configuration file of the project.

methods.name: loadConfig
methods.description: Function to load and parse configuration files.

methods.name: resolveShowConfigPath
methods.description: Function to resolve the path to the configuration or show specific config path.

methods.name: loadPlugin
methods.description: Function to load a Babel plugin by name.

methods.name: loadPreset
methods.description: Function to load a Babel preset by name.

methods.name: resolvePlugin
methods.description: Function to resolve the absolute path to a plugin.

methods.name: resolvePreset
methods.description: Function to resolve the preset path.
